revised_title: Pharmacological Analysis of Aconitine, Diacetyl-Aconitine, Benzaconine, and Aconine
tldr: This study investigates the pharmacological effects of aconitine, diacetyl-aconitine, benzaconine, and aconine, focusing on their relationship to their chemical composition. The authors examine the effects of these alkaloids on the nervous, respiratory, and cardiovascular systems, providing a comprehensive analysis of their actions and potential therapeutic applications.
